bodydiv.p: The Due Process Handbook (Handbook) describes the due process requirements of the Board and the Interpretations Committee relating to their standard-setting activities, the development of materials to support the consistent application of IFRS Standards, and the IFRS Taxonomy. The requirements reflect and further the due process that is laid out in the Constitution.
